entries.name: The transoral thyroidectomy
entries.description: A NESA team consisting of an otolaryngologist, a general surgeon and anatomists conducted at the Erasmus University of Rotterdam the pre-clinical studies concerning the new concept of transoral thyroidectomy. See the following articles.

links.title: Wilhelm T., Harlaar J., Kerver A., Kleinrensink GJ., Benhidjeb T.
links.description: Transoral endoscopic thyroidectomy - Part 1: rationale and anatomical studies. (Chirurg. 2010;81(1):50-5.)

links.title: Benhidjeb T., Harlaar J., Kleinrensink GJ., Kerver A., Wilhelm T.
links.description: Transoral endoscopic thyroidectomy : Part 2: Surgical technique (Chirurg. 2010;81(2):134-8.)
